en.description: From safe and efficient video editing to maintenance, our experts are with you.

step1.title: 1ï¸âƒ£ Consultation
step1.desc: Discuss editing requirements and provide the best solution.

step2.title: 2ï¸âƒ£ Editing
step2.desc: Professionally edit the video according to the client's needs.

step3.title: 3ï¸âƒ£ Feedback
step3.desc: Provide the first version and incorporate client feedback.

step4.title: 4ï¸âƒ£ Completion
step4.desc: Finalize and deliver the polished video.

custom.title: ğŸ¨ Customized Editing
custom.desc: Tailored video production matching your brand style

q1.question: ğŸ’° How is video editing pricing determined?
q1.answer: Costs vary based on video length and complexity. Contact us for a quote.

q2.question: â³ How fast can I receive my edited video?
q2.answer: Typically within 3-5 days. Urgent requests are also available.

q3.question: ğŸ”„ How many revisions are included?
q3.answer: Up to 2 revisions are included. Additional edits can be discussed.

q4.question: ğŸ¬ Can I request a specific editing style?
q4.answer: Yes! We customize edits based on your brand guidelines.

q5.question: ğŸ“ Do you provide subtitles?
q5.answer: Yes! We offer subtitles in multiple languages.
